Question
========

At the Quality of Life Research Center, we want to investigate whether the prediction of depression (yes/no) based on the score on a clinical measurement instrument is the same for men and women. What is the best method to do this? 
Answerlist
----------
* Single regression.
* Multiple regression.
* Single logistic regression.
* Multiple logistic regression.


Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
